1365650.name: Touch Typing Home Row Speed Grinder - Silver Skin
1365650.description:
This DLC is a Downloadable Silver Skin for the Onscreen Keyboard instead of the default Color Coded Skin, the correct finger lights up when a key is pressed in accordance with the "Home Row" Touch Typing Method, helping a user remember which finger to use for the appropriate keys.
--

I invite all to compete with me. ---> "Visit the Website" on the right side of this page to go to the Discord. Beating me will be no easy task tho, since I am within the top 0.2% in the world as far as speed is concerned.
1365650.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
